column4: I'm not concerned about paying, but about all source code bein open. Though I can't read it, it gives me a better feeling in terms of security. That's why I'm mopving away from Windose
use linux in general whichever OS you choose youll like it, just recently got my toshiba satellite working with puppy linux and dsl (50-100mb)
youll watch your movies believe me you will and remoteCTRL true true you didnt
aint you making a fuss over nothing you have an option to use free or restricted its up to you whats best
